title: Economic activities and global exchange networks

content.question: The economic activities described in the passage contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: The emergence of the first truly global exchange networks
The beginning of the process of industrialization
The establishment of the first chartered and limited-liability commercial companies
The rapid growth of Chinaâ€™s population under the Song and Ming dynasties

content.answer: The emergence of the first truly global exchange networks

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
